Your creative sidekick for the web.

Why Choose Vibio?
Effortlessly extract colors and fonts from any webpage with a single click. Designed for creatives, developers, and anyone who loves sleek design, Vibio brings simplicity to your workflow.
– Spot it, Save it: Quickly detect colors and typography without digging into code.
– Streamlined Design: Minimalistic, distraction-free interface that gets straight to the point.
– Neo-Brutalist Vibes: Bold yet simple—just like your ideas.

Who’s It For?
– Designers hunting for inspiration.
– Developers refining UI/UX.
– Anyone who loves turning the web into a playground of creativity.

Get Vibio Today:
Skip the guesswork. Install Vibio: Color & Font Detector and see the web through a new lens.
